title: All of my settings went to default
body: All of my settings went to default and I ended up shitting the bed in a ranked game because I never had time to fix it. Awesome

replies.body: I've seen a few posts about this, and would like to get more info.  Are you using the live or alpha client?  Is it resetting every time or was it only that instance?  It's definitely frustrating that happened unexpectedly in your game, and I'd like to help figure this out.  Let me know!
Same issue here, my settings got deleted/defaulted and I lost my first ranked game today.

I am also having this issue, I dont know what live client or alpha client mean but ive been playing for years and had my settings the exact same the whole time.  All of a sudden they reset at the beginning of the game and I cant fix them in a custom game because they reset every new game...
Happened to me also with live client. I do have the alpha client installed and last time I used it couple days ago. Looks like in game settings reset every time the client is restarted.  Not fun.
